JavaTM Servlet Development Kit
Version 2.1

This is the reference implementation of the JavaTM Servlet Specification version 2.1 available from Sun Microsystems, Inc.

This is the default page for the server. This page is located in your document root. Your document root is located at:

  • <install_dir>/webpages

Documentation:

  • API Documentation
Examples:
  • Servlet Examples
Feedback should be directed to: servlet-feedback@sun.com

In order to promote the Servlet API and to bring a diverse group of users together to talk about servlets, we've created the servlet-interest list. To subscribe to the mailing list, send a message to listserv@java.sun.com with the following message body:

subscribe servlet-interest <Your Full Name>
